CLIENT_CREATE_SUCCESS.title: Client created successfully
CLIENT_CREATE_SUCCESS.description: The client has been successfully added to the system.

CLIENT_CREATE_DOMAIN_EXISTS.title: Domain already in use
CLIENT_CREATE_DOMAIN_EXISTS.description: A client with this domain already exists.

CLIENT_CREATE_FAILED.title: Client creation failed
CLIENT_CREATE_FAILED.description: An unexpected error occurred while creating the client.

CLIENT_FETCH_SUCCESS.title: Client loaded successfully
CLIENT_FETCH_SUCCESS.description: The client data was retrieved successfully.

CLIENT_FETCH_NOT_FOUND.title: Client not found
CLIENT_FETCH_NOT_FOUND.description: The requested client could not be found.

CLIENT_FETCH_FAILED.title: Client fetch failed
CLIENT_FETCH_FAILED.description: An unexpected error occurred while retrieving the client.

CLIENT_FETCH_DASHBOARD_SUCCESS.title: Client dashboard loaded successfully
CLIENT_FETCH_DASHBOARD_SUCCESS.description: The client dashboard data was retrieved successfully.

CLIENT_UPDATE_SUCCESS.title: Client updated successfully
CLIENT_UPDATE_SUCCESS.description: The client data was updated successfully.

CLIENT_UPDATE_FAILED.title: Client update failed
CLIENT_UPDATE_FAILED.description: An unexpected error occurred while updating the client.

CLIENT_MISSING_CLIENT_ID.title: Missing client ID
CLIENT_MISSING_CLIENT_ID.description: A valid client ID is required for registration.

CLIENT_NOT_FOUND.title: Client not found
CLIENT_NOT_FOUND.description: The specified client does not exist.

USER_REGISTER_SUCCESS.title: Registration successful
USER_REGISTER_SUCCESS.description: Your account has been created! We have sent you an email to confirm your address. Please check your inbox.

USER_REGISTER_ALREADY_REGISTERED.title: Account already active
USER_REGISTER_ALREADY_REGISTERED.description: You already have an active account. Please log in.

USER_REGISTER_NEEDS_CORRECT_PASSWORD.title: Password required
USER_REGISTER_NEEDS_CORRECT_PASSWORD.description: This email already has an account. Please enter your current password or reset it.

USER_BLOCKED.title: Access denied
USER_BLOCKED.description: This account is blocked and cannot be used.

USER_TOS_NOT_ACCEPTED.title: Terms not accepted
USER_TOS_NOT_ACCEPTED.description: Please accept the terms and privacy policy to continue.

USER_EMAIL_ALREADY_REGISTERED.title: Email already registered
USER_EMAIL_ALREADY_REGISTERED.description: This email is already registered. Please log in to continue.

USER_VERIFY_EMAIL_SUCCESS.title: Email verified successfully
USER_VERIFY_EMAIL_SUCCESS.description: Your email address has been successfully verified.

USER_VERIFY_EMAIL_RESENDED.title: Verification email resend
USER_VERIFY_EMAIL_RESENDED.description: We have sent you a new verification email.

USER_VERIFY_MISSING_TOKEN.title: Invalid verification link
USER_VERIFY_MISSING_TOKEN.description: The verification token is missing or invalid.

USER_VERIFY_INVALID_TOKEN.title: Invalid token
USER_VERIFY_INVALID_TOKEN.description: The verification link is invalid or corrupted.

USER_NOT_FOUND.title: User not found
USER_NOT_FOUND.description: The user associated with this token could not be found.

LOGOUT_SUCCESS.title: Logged out successfully
LOGOUT_SUCCESS.description: You have been logged out successfully.

LOGOUT_FAILED.title: Logout failed
LOGOUT_FAILED.description: We were unable to log you out. Please try again.

USER_CLIENT_NOT_FOUND.title: Client association not found
USER_CLIENT_NOT_FOUND.description: The user is not associated with this client.

USER_CLIENT_BLOCKED.title: Access blocked
USER_CLIENT_BLOCKED.description: Your account is blocked for this client.

USER_CLIENT_COOKIES_UPDATE_SUCCESS.title: Cookie settings updated
USER_CLIENT_COOKIES_UPDATE_SUCCESS.description: Your cookie preferences have been saved successfully.

REFRESH_TOKEN_MISSING.title: Reauthentication required
REFRESH_TOKEN_MISSING.description: Your session is no longer valid. Please log in again.

REFRESH_TOKEN_EXPIRED.title: Session expired
REFRESH_TOKEN_EXPIRED.description: Your session has expired. Please log in again.

ACCESS_TOKEN_REFRESHED.title: Session renewed
ACCESS_TOKEN_REFRESHED.description: Your access token has been successfully refreshed.

MAGIC_TOKEN_EXPIRED.title: Login link expired
MAGIC_TOKEN_EXPIRED.description: The magic login link has expired. Please request a new one.

MAGIC_TOKEN_INVALID.title: Invalid login link
MAGIC_TOKEN_INVALID.description: The magic login token is invalid or corrupted.

MAGIC_LOGIN_SUCCESS.title: Login successful
MAGIC_LOGIN_SUCCESS.description: You have been logged in successfully.

AUTH_NOT_LOGGED_IN.title: Login required
AUTH_NOT_LOGGED_IN.description: You need to be logged in to perform this action.
